synopsis.text: It's time for an exciting crossover between the popular mobile RPG game, Brave Frontier, and the renowned anime franchise, Himitsukessha Taka no Tsume! The collaboration kicks off with an animated version of Brave Frontier's director, Eiji Takahashi, parodying the Taka no Tsume NEO Announcement Movie trailer. As the director of the upcoming DC Super Heroes vs. Taka no Tsume Dan film, Takahashi reveals a plethora of perks for fans of both worlds, including discounted movie tickets for Brave Frontier players and the appearance of movie characters in the game for Taka no Tsume enthusiasts. Among the highlights is an animated cameo of Kaoringo, a real-life public relations staff member for Brave Frontier at Famitsu App's editorial department. As an added bonus, some lucky fans will receive tickets to a special screening, where Kaoringo will personally introduce the film to the audience. Don't miss out on this thrilling collaboration!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
